H1.text: Who was the head of the German Ministry of Public Enlightenment and Propaganda from 1933 to 1945. Heinrich Himmler

H2.text: Who was the head of the German Ministry of Public Enlightenment and Propaganda from 1933 to 1945. Joseph Goebbels' brother

H3.text: Who was the head of the German Ministry of Public Enlightenment and Propaganda from 1933 to 1945. Goebles

A4.text: Goebbels was appointed head of the Reich Ministry of Public Enlightenment and Propaganda in March 1933.

A5.text: Goebbels was Reich Minister of Propaganda from 1933 until his suicide in 1945.

A6.text: Goebbels had been the Reich propaganda leader of the Nazi Party since April 1930.

A7.text: Joseph Goebbels, who exercised control over all German mass media and creative artists through his ministry.
